title: I just wiped my Block List (over 200 Players)
body: Don't let me down OCE. Show me that you can reform.

replies.body:
I block every person I see so I'd always meet new people ^_^
#positivityAndOptimism

lmao, my block list is around 800 players.
Many of them probably don't play anymore though, that's since OCE came into existence.

It doesn't actually mean anything though, as the auto mute on block listed players ceased to work ages ago, idk why.
